message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"half","sentence":"她有半个面包。","image_prompt":"A young woman sits at a simple table, holding half a loaf of bread. The setting is minimal, with gentle, soft lighting and subtle hints of gentle apocalypse—slightly muted colors, faint cracks in the background wall, but an overall peaceful atmosphere. The focus is on the woman and the half loaf in her hands, animated softly in an artistic, dreamy style.","sentence_translation":"She has half a loaf of bread."}
